title: Abra Cadabra (1983) Character Sketch: Abra, Mr Pig and the Mayor

brief_description:
Abra Cadabra (1983) Character Sketch: Abra, Mr Pig and the Mayor donated by Paddy Stitt as part of the [Donation: Alexander Stitt Collection]
Animation cel adhered to cardboard, paper mount stuck on top (ripped and disintegrating)
